Articles.Content:
I have never noticed this happening before today, although I haven't actually needed to use one for a week or so so I may have forgotten. Anyway I have a Mk16 parachute mounted on my lander, and as I lose altitude and speed the parachute automatically deploys. Is that usual behaviour? I would rather have manual control over its deployment.

Edited January 9, 2014 by steelgrey
I guess you probably deployed it before the deployment conditions were met. The moment the correct altitude and pressure are established, parachute jumps out.
Okay I'll have a look at my staging then. Operator error as usual
